This is a specimen of the graphics that require 1 input variable and that, up to now, are being considered by the brinton's `wideplot()`, `longplot()` and `showplot()` functions.

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, comment=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  message=FALSE, 
  warning=FALSE, 
  comment=NA, 
  dev='png', 
  echo=FALSE
  )

# length(unique(ManagersHalf$playerID))/6 + 0.5
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(brinton)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
```


# Logical variables:

```{r, fig.width=12, fig.height=0.83}
data(ca2006, package = "pscl")
gridExtra::grid.arrange(showplot(ca2006, "open", "line graph", output = 'plots pane'), 
                        showplot(ca2006, "open", "point graph", output = 'plots pane'), 
                        showplot(ca2006, "open", "point-to-point graph", output = 'plots pane'), 
                        heights=unit(c(0.83), c("in")),
                        ncol=5)
cat("logical = c('line graph', 'point graph', 'point-to-point graph')")
```

```{r, fig.width=12, fig.height=0.83}
gridExtra::grid.arrange(showplot(ca2006, "open", "tile plot", output = 'plots pane'), 
                        showplot(ca2006, "open", "linerange graph", output = 'plots pane'),
                        heights=unit(c(0.83), c("in")),
                        ncol=5)
cat("logical = c('tile plot', 'linerange graph')")
```

```{r, fig.width=12, fig.height=0.83}
gridExtra::grid.arrange(showplot(ca2006, "open", "binned heatmap", output = 'plots pane'), 
                        showplot(ca2006, "open", "bw binned heatmap", output = 'plots pane'),
                        showplot(ca2006, "open", "color binned heatmap", output = 'plots pane'),
                        heights=unit(c(0.83), c("in")),
                        ncol=5)
cat("logical = c('binned heatmap', 'bw binned heatmap', 'color binned heatmap')")
```

```{r, fig.width=12, fig.height=0.83}
gridExtra::grid.arrange(showplot(ca2006, "open", "bar graph", output = 'plots pane'), 
                        showplot(ca2006, "open", "bw bar graph", output = 'plots pane'),
                        showplot(ca2006, "open", "color bar graph", output = 'plots pane'),
                        heights=unit(c(0.83), c("in")),
                        ncol=5)
cat("logical = c('bar graph', 'bw bar graph', 'color bar graph')")
```

# Datetime variables:

```{r}
flights_dt <- nycflights13::flights %>% 
  transmute(departure = make_datetime(
    year, 
    month, 
    day, 
    hour, 
    minute)
    )
```

```{r, fig.width=12, fig.height=2.4}
gridExtra::grid.arrange(showplot(flights_dt[1:50,], "departure", "line graph", output = 'plots pane'),
                        showplot(flights_dt[1:50,], "departure", "stepped line graph", output = 'plots pane'),
                        heights=unit(c(2.4), c("in")),
                        ncol=5)
cat("datetime = c('line graph', 'stepped line graph')")
```

```{r, fig.width=12, fig.height=2.4}

                        showplot(flights_dt[1:50,], "departure", "point-to-point graph", output = 'plots pane'),
                        heights=unit(c(2.4), c("in")),
                        ncol=5)
cat("datetime = c('point graph', 'point-to-point graph')")
```

